headline: What Equifax (EFX)'s New AI and Cloud Patents Mean For Shareholders
summary: In the past week, Equifax announced it secured 27 additional patents in the second half of 2025, bringing its yearly total to 62 and expanding a portfolio of nearly 700 issued or pending patents across 15 countries, heavily focused on AI, cloud infrastructure, and risk and fraud solutions. These patents deepen Equifax’s EFX.AI and Equifax Cloud capabilities, potentially strengthening its role in AI-enabled credit, income verification, and security solutions that underpin many financial...
